Create functions to calculate distance and midpoint. 

```{r}
distance <- function(a,b){
  sqrt((a[1]-b[1])^2+(a[2]-b[2])^2)
}

midpoint <- function(a,b){
  mid <- c();
  mid[1] <- (a[1]+b[1])/2;
  mid[2] <- (a[2]+b[2])/2;
  return(mid)
}
```
